sentences.en: At present, Our country has entried a accelerating period of the urbanization.
sentences.cn: 目前, 我国已经进入城镇化加速发展时期.

sentences.en: Cities grew in the north of Britain where, previously , urbanization had been minimal.
sentences.cn: 在英国的北部,城市增加起以前那里曾经是城市化最低的地区.

sentences.en: Countries and regions all over the world face the challenge of urbanization.
sentences.cn: 全球各地的国家和地区都面临城市化的挑战。

sentences.en: Equally important to urbanization, the nation's population was increasing.
sentences.cn: 城市化的另一重要因素是全国人口的不断增加.

sentences.en: Generally speaking, the advantages of urbanization can be as follows.
sentences.cn: 一般说来, 农村化可以带来下列益处.

sentences.en: If fast growth and urbanization continue, some overcapacity will melt away.
sentences.cn: 如果高速增长和城市化进程得以持续, 部分产能过剩将得到消化.

sentences.en: In 1931, The system of urbanization possessed its embryonic form.
sentences.cn: 到1931年“九·一八”事变, 区域城市体系粗具雏形.

sentences.en: In the past 10 - odd years China has speeded up urbanization.
sentences.cn: 10多年来,中国加快了城市化进程.

sentences.en: In their own process of urbanization, every country will encounter the problem of land requisition and housing demolition.
sentences.cn: 每个国家在自己的城市化进程中，都会遇到土地征用、房屋拆迁的问题。

sentences.en: In this way, their lives can be improved and the newtype of urbanization can proceed together with agriculturalmodernization.
sentences.cn: 这样，他们的生活可以改善以及新型的城镇化可以和农业现代化共同前进。

sentences.en: Include how to classify tour urbanization and tour area urbanization.
sentences.cn: 包括如何区分旅游城市化和旅游区城市化.

sentences.en: Much of this, she says, is due to increased urbanization.
sentences.cn: 而这些，主要是由于不断增加的都市化造成的。

sentences.en: Suburbanization and counter - urbanization are two concepts of similarities as well as differences.
sentences.cn: 郊区化与逆城市化是既有联系又有区别的两个概念,逆城市化是郊区化的升级版本.

sentences.en: The increasingly fast urbanization process requires more and more infrastructures.
sentences.cn: 我国城市化进程不断加快,对城市基础设施的需求也越来越大.

sentences.en: The rapid urbanization produces a lot of extraneous people.
sentences.cn: 城市化的加速催生了庞大的外来人口群体.

sentences.en: The urbanization level increased from 19.39 percent in 1980 to 28.85 percent in 1995.
These diseases are now everywhere, driven as they are by universal forces, like urbanization and the globalization of unhealthy lifestyles.
sentences.cn: 现在，在城市化和不健康生活方式的全球化等普遍因素的影响下，这些疾病无处不在。

sentences.en: Urbanization in Spain is distinctly correlated with a fall in reproductive rate.
sentences.cn: 西班牙都市化进程很明显和该国的出生率下降有关.

sentences.en: Urbanization will become increasingly important in the future.
sentences.cn: 城市化将来将变得越来越重要.

sentences.en: Yet an anti - migrant attitude runs consistently through the mainstream of urbanization.
sentences.cn: 然而,反对农民工进城的态度一直贯穿于城市化主流进程之中.

words.tran_cn: 彬彬有礼的，温文尔雅的；都市化的

trans.tran_en: Urbanization is the process of creating cities or towns in country areas
